story: Once upon a time, in Deepwood Motte there was a procurer whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Martell. It was the Summer Solstice in Raventree Hall when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  equality of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the erasing Memory power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Seagard when Tyrion Lannister met Sansa Stark .  From Sansa Stark Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of gravity Control. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Deepwood Motte.  Tyrion Lannister met Arya Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Viserys Targaryen. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Christmas in The Whispering Wood when  Tyrion Lannister faced Margaery Tyrell. Tyrion Lannister used the power of invisibility , but Margaery Tyrell used night Vision. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved House. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was Christmas in Kings Landing,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was Easter day in The Twins when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Arya Stark by getting married.
